General.Name: UBI Blockchain Internet Ltd
General.Description: UBI Blockchain Internet, Ltd. focuses on the research and application of blockchain technology with a focus on the Internet of things covering areas of food, drugs, and healthcare. It also operates an online store in China selling a range of products, including maternal and infant, cosmetics, wine, household goods, and digital and luxury products. The company was formerly known as JA Energy and changed its name to UBI Blockchain Internet, Ltd. in November 2016. UBI Blockchain Internet, Ltd. was founded in 2010 and is based in Hong Kong, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Core F, Smart Space, Hong Kong, Hong Kong
